CustomField.formula: CASE(MOD( DATEVALUE(Test_Reminder_Date__c) - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, Test_Reminder_Date__c+5, 1, Test_Reminder_Date__c+7, 2, Test_Reminder_Date__c+7, 3, Test_Reminder_Date__c+7, 4, Test_Reminder_Date__c+7, 5,Test_Reminder_Date__c+7, 6,Test_Reminder_Date__c+6, Test_Reminder_Date__c)
CustomField.label: 5 Business Day Reminder
